s.text: All the papers report that federal agents broke an illegal alien smuggling ring that allegedly brought Asian workers to the United States.

Senator Albert Gore, Sr. will no doubt take great comfort in learning from a NYT correction (of an article about Clark Clifford's memorial service) that he is not "late," but actually 90 years old and living in Carthage, Tennessee.
This means that if House democrats remain united, then only three more "nays" from the GOP will kill the impeachment effort.
